title: Work Your Weakness (Rich Wilkerson Jr.)
description:
Our weakness is an opportunity for His strength. In “Work Your Weakness,” Pastor Rich Wilkerson Jr. of Vous Church reminds us that when we are weak, we can stand in God’s strength.


We can't wait to be back out on the road with Pastor Steven Furtick and Elevation Worship! Get your tickets NOW at elevationnights.com.

April 26 - Chicago, IL | NOW Arena

April 27 - Grand Rapids, MI | Van Andel Arena

April 29 - Indianapolis, IN | Gainbridge Fieldhouse

April 30 - Columbus, OH | Nationwide Arena

May 1 - Washington, DC | Capital One Arena

May 3 - Reading, PA | Santander Arena

May 4 - Newark, NJ | Prudential Center

May 5 - Boston, MA | TD Garden
